messages: b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:38): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: manipulating the textContent of <style> works in Gecko and WebKit. fails in opera...

b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (15:53): if(an3err.number == -0x7FFF0001) style.styleSheet.cssText

b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (16:20): what's the expected way of detecting whether hashchanged is supported?
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:20): "The following line is used in a number of the tests. It is done using document.write() to sidestep complaints of validity." why not use <object>?
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:20): i guess there mightbe more issues
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:21): if(window.onhaschanged) maybe
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:21): with proper spelling
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (16:23): oh. I didn't expect it to have non-false truthiness until set
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (16:24): if (window.onhaschanged !== undefined) maybe?
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (16:24): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: it appears that unset event handlers are undefined
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:24): what ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c said should work
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (16:24): Oh, Opera 9.2 says window.onload === null, Firefox 2 says undefined
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (16:24): ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c: that kind of test doesn't detect support for window.onload
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:24): b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9, they are null
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:25): oh, Firefox :(
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (16:25): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: undefined in firefox 3
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:25): does anyone still use that?
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (16:25): IE6 says null
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:26): HTML5 says null
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:26): hmm, what does HTML4 say
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:26): we should add this to Acid3
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (16:26): well then. I guess it is time to search bugzilla
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:27): oh, I guess these type of event handlers are not defined anywhere
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:27): HTML5 has them fortunately
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:27): but that's a bit late for Acid3
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:29): lol http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/interact/scripts.html#h-18.2.3

edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:29): "Note. Authors of HTML documents are advised that changes are likely to occur in the realm of intrinsic events (e.g., how scripts are bound to events). Research in this realm is carried on by members of the W3C Document Object Model Working Group (see the W3C Web Site at http://www.w3.org/ for more information)."
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:29): and how much better it became...
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (16:30): hmm. looks like this bug hasn't  been filed yet

b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (16:34): hmm. window.onload is undefined in Opera 9.50 beta, too
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:34): grmbl
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (16:36): but null indeed in Opera 9.20
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (16:39): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: I can't find a HTML5 justification for event handelers on the window object getting initialized to null
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (16:39): oops. found it
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (16:47): filed bug https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=414853
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (16:59): Oh, IE6 has window.onload === null but window.onanythingelse === undefined for all anythingelses that I've tried
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (17:00): and Opera 9.2 seems to do it for onload and nothing else too
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (17:00): hmm
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (17:01): there's a use case for changing the behavior, but how useful that would be given deployed stuff...
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (17:02): and given that you can use "typeof window.onload" as well
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (17:03): (Ah, IE6 does onunload === null too)
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (17:03): oh wait, typeof also only works for certain stuff
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (17:03): bah
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (17:03): and Opera 9.2 does it on onunload too
